blog.description:
E, 18 | I write about H 💫| angst writer |

https://hes-writer.tumblr.com/post/182379780183/masterlist

body:
Jealousy

Summary: Harry drives and Y/N argues

Warnings: lil angst, loads of fluff??

Word Count: 561

Based on: I had an idea last night that h and his girl get into an argument while driving 😂

“He was all over you, Y/N! And you let him,” Harry says while him and Y/N exit the small family gathering they attended together. He stuffs his hand in his jean pocket for the car keys.

“He wasn’t, I told you,” Y/N huffs, crossing her arms over her chest as a sign of annoyance and slightly because it was getting a little too chilly for her to be dressed so thinly in the cold night. She walks to the passenger’s side, head turning to inspect her surroundings. The neighborhood was dimly lit up with orange-hued street lights.

The car beeps and she could hear the doors unlock from Harry’s FOB. Y/N pulls on the handle and opens the door at the same time as Harry situates himself in his seat.  He waits for her, nonetheless.

“Hurry up,” He directs. She pauses, midway through pulling the seat belt strap across her body.

“Why are you rushing me?” He huffs at her retort, tapping his ring-clad fingers on the steering wheel.  

As soon as he heard the ‘click’ of the belt, he shifts the gear into reverse and backs away from his parking spot. He does a shoulder check and while doing so, he catches a glimpse of his girlfriends’ pouted lips.

“Can you tell me what happened?” He speaks once again. He pulls into the main road and begins their journey home.

“I slipped and he caught me,”

A flashback plays in his mind and he vaguely remembers the conversation they had earlier that night.

—-

“Y/N, those flats don’t have grips at the bottom,”

“So? They’re so cute,” She squeals, admiring the way her legs looked in the mirror.

“Soo, you’re gonna slip, lovie” he explains, wrapping his arms around her from behind, resting his chin on her shoulder.

—-

He shakes his head incredulously at the spike of realization.

“I told you not to wear them,”

Y/N does a double-take toward him, hearing the slight teasing tone in his voice and she can’t help but whine out.

“Heeeeyyy, it was cute! And you said it looked pretty on me too,”

“That may be, but you slipped, you clumsy girl,” He chuckles, right hand moving from the center console to her knee, rubbing the taut skin gently.

“Yes, but that man caught me,” She muses jokingly, shoulder wiggling up and down mirroring her eyebrows.

Harry pauses his actions and he looks at her when they stop at a red light.

“Y/N”

“Harry,” She says back, mimicking his deep and stern voice. He rolls his eyes at her while she throws her head back laughing.

Looking back to the road, he couldn’t help but let a sly smile overtake his lips. One more glance at Y/N’s pretty face and it was like his anger had dissolved into thin air.

“I love you, Y/N”

“Hmm, I know,” She hums back, a smile lingering on her lips. Even though he wander looking at her directly, he could detect the hint of happiness in her voice.

He pinches the skin of her thigh lightly, “Ow, hey!” She slaps his arm.

“Stop tha’, I’m driving, you nut,” He uses his thumb to caress the reddened skin and Y/N herself feels the same overwhelming fondness floating in her chest.

“Styles, you’re gonna be the death of me,”

——–

trying out some fluff!

let me know what you thought :)

@ynm1505 @kissme-hs @agoddamnmango

She found my love and kept it safe from the world.

blog.name: kissykindness
blog.title: Treat People with Kindness
blog.description: My place for some writing of the fabulous Harry Styles. Kissy.

title: Adore
body:
This imagine is based of the song “Adore” by Amy Shark. If you want to listen to it while reading, to set the mood ;), you can do that here. The lyrics are in italics. For the sake of the story, I didn’t include all of them, just about a little more than half into the song.


I’m just gonna stand with my bag hanging off my left arm
I’m just gonna walk home kicking stones at parked cars


It was about 3:30 am and I was on my way home. My heals were dangling in my right hand, I couldn’t bear to wear them for even a second longer. My little purse was dangling from my left arm, which still felt warm from the touch of him. I never thought that anybody could get so infatuated with a person so fast, but I did, obviously. Just the thought of him had me smiling from ear to ear. He was… breathtaking. I’ve never seen him before that night in the pub, but Craig, a mutual friend, had introduced him today. And as he smiled at me for the first time, I felt warm, and safe, and… dazzled. Never happened to me before. Could you fall in love at first sight? Stupid, stupid, stupid. Where was this confident, independent young woman which I was proud to be? All gone now, just by the thought of him? I was so frustrated at myself, that I began to kick around little rocks that were on the street. I hit a car by accident, but I was too intoxicated to care.


But I had a great night, ‘cause you kept rubbing against my arm
I’m just gonna stand with my bag hanging off my left arm


But he was more than just a pretty face, so much more. I actually did get to know him a bit that night, because he was very talkative, at least to the rest of our group. It was a bit embarrassing, but I nearly didn’t talk to him at all. Just a litte ‘hello’, that was all. But I listened to him. He had a nice voice, so it was comfortable hearing him tell the others about what he did for a living, how he was excited to meet us all, since Craig had told him so much about us and had made him curious.

The later it had gotten, the more people that some of my friends had invited too, were joining us. Soon, it was very crowded in our booth, so we all had to squeeze in a bit. Fortunately, he was sitting next to me. So from then on, our arms were touching.

“Is that okay, love?”, he had asked in that deep, raspy voice of his. Immediately, I could feel a shiver running down my back at the new nickname.

“Sure”, I said, hoping that I didn’t give myself away. Yep, that was the second word I had spoken to him.

When we had ordered our second round of beers, and my hand had been resting on my thigh for a little while now, he had put his hand on his thigh, too. Then, with the conversation going on, he had inched his hand slowly towards mine. I had never felt butterflies like that before. And when he finally touched it, it was as if I had forgotten how to breathe, at least for a few seconds. He turned a little bit and smiled at me, that didn’t help with my breathing at all. But I still managed to smile back.

Now, it was as if I could still feel that spark of electricity from the lingering touch. Oh god, when had I gone back to puberty again?


Get me a drink, I get drunk off one sip just so I can adore you
I want the entire street out of town just so I can be alone with you


Even though I didn’t have as much to drink as usually on these nights, I had felt pretty intoxicated pretty early into the night. And his alluring scent hadn’t helped with that either. I didn’t know if it was cologne, simply him, or maybe just a delicious mixture, but I had absolutely loved it and I still did. I inhaled deeply, first the cold night air, then the scent that still lingered in his jacket he had given me for the walk home.

I had been torn between wanting to be all alone with him, and being glad that I could just watch his lips curve around the words he was saying without having to pay too much attention.


Now go when you’re ready
My head’s getting heavy pressed against your arm
I adore you


The longer we had been sitting there, him holding my hand under the table, the more tired I had grown. He was just so comforting, but at the same time very exciting to be around. It was pretty hard to explain. Soon my head had found its way against his shoulder. I was earning some stares from some of my friends, especially the few girls who had joined us tonight, but honestly, I couldn’t care less. And I felt even more content, when his right hand, who had been holding my left all night, snaked its way behind my back around my waist. How could a boy that I just met have such an enormous effect on me? Damn.

When the pub was nearly closing, we had decided to all just go home. I missed his warmth immediately after I had gotten up, and I still did. He had given me his jacket, so I could keep warm on my short walk to my appartment. And he had made me tipe my number into his phone, sending me a quick text after, so I had his number, too.

“(Y/N), what a beautiful name. Suits you.” Could I ever get his voice out of my head?

“Thanks. And thanks again for the jacket”, I had said, before turning around to say goodbye to the rest of my friends. Comparing that to the rest of the night, I had really said much.

“Should I walk you home?”, he had asked, as I had turned around to him again. Remembering that he lived in the other side of town, I had said: “I’ll be fine, thanks, Harry.”

“Text me when you’re home, okay? Don’t wanna worry all night, you know?”, he had said, quickly kissing my cheekbone right after. I had blushed a deep red for sure. “Will do”, I had answered, squeezing his hand, that had sneaked his way into mine again. Then we parted ways.

So now, I was walking still with that silly smile on my lips. I was nearly home now, when I felt my phone vibrate in my back pocket.

“You already home, love? -H.”


Sooo, that’s about it. I haven’t written anything in ages, let alone post it here on this blog, that has a new name actually. It was formerly known blurbs-writing, maybe you still remember. I also have a little bit of trouble with masterlist, so I can’t link that (yet, I hope). UPDATE: It’s here. But, if you feel like requesting something, you can do that here.

Love, M.

When we had ordered our second round of beers, and my hand had been resting on my thigh for a little while now, he had put his hand on his thigh, too. Then, with the conversation going on, he had inched his hand slowly towards mine. I had never felt butterflies like that before. And when he finally touched it, it was as if I had forgotten how to breathe, at least for a few seconds. He turned a little bit and smiled at me, that didn’t help with my breathing at all. But I still managed to smile back.

Now, it was as if I could still feel that spark of electricity from the lingering touch. Oh god, when had I gone back to puberty again?


Get me a drink, I get drunk off one sip just so I can adore you
I want the entire street out of town just so I can be alone with you


Even though I didn’t have as much to drink as usually on these nights, I had felt pretty intoxicated pretty early into the night. And his alluring scent hadn’t helped with that either. I didn’t know if it was cologne, simply him, or maybe just a delicious mixture, but I had absolutely loved it and I still did. I inhaled deeply, first the cold night air, then the scent that still lingered in his jacket he had given me for the walk home.

I had been torn between wanting to be all alone with him, and being glad that I could just watch his lips curve around the words he was saying without having to pay too much attention.


Now go when you’re ready
My head’s getting heavy pressed against your arm
I adore you


The longer we had been sitting there, him holding my hand under the table, the more tired I had grown. He was just so comforting, but at the same time very exciting to be around. It was pretty hard to explain. Soon my head had found its way against his shoulder. I was earning some stares from some of my friends, especially the few girls who had joined us tonight, but honestly, I couldn’t care less. And I felt even more content, when his right hand, who had been holding my left all night, snaked its way behind my back around my waist. How could a boy that I just met have such an enormous effect on me? Damn.

When the pub was nearly closing, we had decided to all just go home. I missed his warmth immediately after I had gotten up, and I still did. He had given me his jacket, so I could keep warm on my short walk to my appartment. And he had made me tipe my number into his phone, sending me a quick text after, so I had his number, too.

“(Y/N), what a beautiful name. Suits you.” Could I ever get his voice out of my head?

“Thanks. And thanks again for the jacket”, I had said, before turning around to say goodbye to the rest of my friends. Comparing that to the rest of the night, I had really said much.

“Should I walk you home?”, he had asked, as I had turned around to him again. Remembering that he lived in the other side of town, I had said: “I’ll be fine, thanks, Harry.”

“Text me when you’re home, okay? Don’t wanna worry all night, you know?”, he had said, quickly kissing my cheekbone right after. I had blushed a deep red for sure. “Will do”, I had answered, squeezing his hand, that had sneaked his way into mine again. Then we parted ways.

So now, I was walking still with that silly smile on my lips. I was nearly home now, when I felt my phone vibrate in my back pocket.

“You already home, love? -H.”


Sooo, that’s about it. I haven’t written anything in ages, let alone post it here on this blog, that has a new name actually. It was formerly known blurbs-writing, maybe you still remember. I also have a little bit of trouble with masterlist, so I can’t link that (yet, I hope). UPDATE: It’s here. But, if you feel like requesting something, you can do that here.

Love, M.

trail.content_raw:
This imagine is based of the song “Adore” by Amy Shark. If you want to listen to it while reading, to set the mood ;), you can do that here. The lyrics are in italics. For the sake of the story, I didn’t include all of them, just about a little more than half into the song.


I’m just gonna stand with my bag hanging off my left arm
I’m just gonna walk home kicking stones at parked cars


It was about 3:30 am and I was on my way home. My heals were dangling in my right hand, I couldn’t bear to wear them for even a second longer. My little purse was dangling from my left arm, which still felt warm from the touch of him. I never thought that anybody could get so infatuated with a person so fast, but I did, obviously. Just the thought of him had me smiling from ear to ear. He was… breathtaking. I’ve never seen him before that night in the pub, but Craig, a mutual friend, had introduced him today. And as he smiled at me for the first time, I felt warm, and safe, and… dazzled. Never happened to me before. Could you fall in love at first sight? Stupid, stupid, stupid. Where was this confident, independent young woman which I was proud to be? All gone now, just by the thought of him? I was so frustrated at myself, that I began to kick around little rocks that were on the street. I hit a car by accident, but I was too intoxicated to care.


But I had a great night, ‘cause you kept rubbing against my arm
I’m just gonna stand with my bag hanging off my left arm


But he was more than just a pretty face, so much more. I actually did get to know him a bit that night, because he was very talkative, at least to the rest of our group. It was a bit embarrassing, but I nearly didn’t talk to him at all. Just a litte ‘hello’, that was all. But I listened to him. He had a nice voice, so it was comfortable hearing him tell the others about what he did for a living, how he was excited to meet us all, since Craig had told him so much about us and had made him curious.

The later it had gotten, the more people that some of my friends had invited too, were joining us. Soon, it was very crowded in our booth, so we all had to squeeze in a bit. Fortunately, he was sitting next to me. So from then on, our arms were touching.

“Is that okay, love?”, he had asked in that deep, raspy voice of his. Immediately, I could feel a shiver running down my back at the new nickname.

“Sure”, I said, hoping that I didn’t give myself away. Yep, that was the second word I had spoken to him.

When we had ordered our second round of beers, and my hand had been resting on my thigh for a little while now, he had put his hand on his thigh, too. Then, with the conversation going on, he had inched his hand slowly towards mine. I had never felt butterflies like that before. And when he finally touched it, it was as if I had forgotten how to breathe, at least for a few seconds. He turned a little bit and smiled at me, that didn’t help with my breathing at all. But I still managed to smile back.

Now, it was as if I could still feel that spark of electricity from the lingering touch. Oh god, when had I gone back to puberty again?


Get me a drink, I get drunk off one sip just so I can adore you
I want the entire street out of town just so I can be alone with you


Even though I didn’t have as much to drink as usually on these nights, I had felt pretty intoxicated pretty early into the night. And his alluring scent hadn’t helped with that either. I didn’t know if it was cologne, simply him, or maybe just a delicious mixture, but I had absolutely loved it and I still did. I inhaled deeply, first the cold night air, then the scent that still lingered in his jacket he had given me for the walk home.

I had been torn between wanting to be all alone with him, and being glad that I could just watch his lips curve around the words he was saying without having to pay too much attention.


Now go when you’re ready
My head’s getting heavy pressed against your arm
I adore you


The longer we had been sitting there, him holding my hand under the table, the more tired I had grown. He was just so comforting, but at the same time very exciting to be around. It was pretty hard to explain. Soon my head had found its way against his shoulder. I was earning some stares from some of my friends, especially the few girls who had joined us tonight, but honestly, I couldn’t care less. And I felt even more content, when his right hand, who had been holding my left all night, snaked its way behind my back around my waist. How could a boy that I just met have such an enormous effect on me? Damn.

When the pub was nearly closing, we had decided to all just go home. I missed his warmth immediately after I had gotten up, and I still did. He had given me his jacket, so I could keep warm on my short walk to my appartment. And he had made me tipe my number into his phone, sending me a quick text after, so I had his number, too.

“(Y/N), what a beautiful name. Suits you.” Could I ever get his voice out of my head?

“Thanks. And thanks again for the jacket”, I had said, before turning around to say goodbye to the rest of my friends. Comparing that to the rest of the night, I had really said much.

“Should I walk you home?”, he had asked, as I had turned around to him again. Remembering that he lived in the other side of town, I had said: “I’ll be fine, thanks, Harry.”

“Text me when you’re home, okay? Don’t wanna worry all night, you know?”, he had said, quickly kissing my cheekbone right after. I had blushed a deep red for sure. “Will do”, I had answered, squeezing his hand, that had sneaked his way into mine again. Then we parted ways.

So now, I was walking still with that silly smile on my lips. I was nearly home now, when I felt my phone vibrate in my back pocket.

“You already home, love? -H.”


Sooo, that’s about it. I haven’t written anything in ages, let alone post it here on this blog, that has a new name actually. It was formerly known blurbs-writing, maybe you still remember. I also have a little bit of trouble with masterlist, so I can’t link that (yet, I hope). UPDATE: It’s here. But, if you feel like requesting something, you can do that here.

Love, M.

blog.name: waitingfortwilight
blog.title: Kate
blog.description: 23 but often grumbles like a 90 year old // oh so very English // I write about Harry, feedback is always appreciated, but be NICE or don’t bother // Requests are currently CLOSED // Masterlist Kiddies!

summary: hello love, looking for some OU fic recs, preferably series, have you got any? thanks!
question: hello love, looking for some OU fic recs, preferably series, have you got any? thanks!
answer:
Hi lovely!! Thank you for asking, I love getting shit like this! Admittedly I have no idea what OU means because I am a dumb bitch that’s still getting used to all the terminology, so I have listed the longest pieces I can think of! I’m sorry if I’m useless!

As always, all of @domestic-styles works are an absolute definite must read! Her pieces are literal novels so you’ll be occupied for days with those bad boys!

@harryonstage has a long series called Under The Same Roof, and also her dealer H piece is pretty long and she’s just posted a part 2!

The Flatmate and In Another Life Series’s by @heyyyharry could easily occupy you for some time, and she’s also posting a second group of pieces to the Flatmate series which are just as good (The Couple in Flat 102)!

The Wish Upon A Star series by @mysweetestcreature once took up my entire evening until the late hours of a morning I would later have to go to work on, and she’s also got a Harry Potter series that I am yet to read but definitely will be!

I am 100% positive that there are more that I’ve read that I’m missing but it’s early and I haven’t had coffee yet 🤦🏼‍♀️ hope this helps my love! Kate xxx
